sentences.en: Appendages on orchid floral labellum that lack floral rewards for pollinators are considered attractive signals to potential pollinators.
sentences.cn: 一些兰科植物常常利用多种多样的欺骗性传粉机制吸引传粉者，唇瓣上的附属物就是其中之一。

sentences.en: Pollinators are often visually attracted by the shape and colours of the labellum .
sentences.cn: 传粉昆虫通常被唇瓣的形状和颜色的视觉效果所吸引。

trans.tran_cn: （昆虫的）唇瓣，（兰花花托上通常大的）中心花瓣
trans.tran_en: the part of the corolla of certain plants, esp orchids, that forms a distinct, often lobed, lip
